import React from 'react' function CommentSection() { let comments = document.querySelector('.comments'); // for comments section let name = document.getElementById('name') //input value let message = document.getElementById('message') // input value let save = document.querySelector('.save') // button function comment(){ comments.innerHTML += ` ${name.value}:

${message.value}

` } return (
) } export default CommentSection
